title: Two Halves
description: Sarah killed her human mother shortly after she was born soshe could quench her thirst. She hates her vampire father who she never met andblames him for her mother's death.Now twenty-one, Sarah suppresses her dark side with serums. When anightmare stirs her dark traits, underworld creatures hunt for the half-breedvampire. On the run, Sarah learns the secrets hidden from her, for a goodreason. Had she known her destiny, she may have continued with the serums thatkept her safe in the human world.
author: Marta Szemik
